segments.text: Do you have a package tour to Hollywood ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , here is the table , which plans do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The seven-days trip shall be fine . How much is this tour ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will take the trip . Could you give us a pamphlet ?
segments.speaker: S1
